data.text:
The first race of the fall season… The Kyōto Daishōten was won by 
Mejiro McQueen in marvellous fashion.

Due to her steady growth, the public's 
fondness of her only grew.

Amazing! This book, that book, all of 
these books have McQueen on them!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: I did not think I would get to this level of fame…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Ah! It's Mejo MaKeen! Please shake my hand!
data.name: Little Boy

data.text: Of course I will. Also, it is pronounced Mejiro McQueen.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Even young kids know of you. Ain't that 
right, Miss Star Uma Musume!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: Jeez… Please stop teasing me.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
I'll be rooting for you in the next race, 
Mejo MaKeen! I believe in you!
data.name: Little Boy

data.text:
Thank you very much. I will be sure to win. 
Also, it is pronounced Mejiro McQueen.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Okay, bye bye!
data.name: Little Boy

data.text: Goodbye.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: My reputation has gotten quite larger than I had realized…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: What is it? The fame starting to make you nervous?
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
Th-That's definitely not the case! As a member of the Mejiro 
Family I am simply full of pride!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Hmm… I think it's fine to be a little nervous though, ya know?
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: Jeez, please stop saying such irrelevant things.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Good morning everyone.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
McQueen-san, listen to this! The amount of Uma Musume that want 
to be transferred here is increasing!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

data.text: It has been like that since the Kyōto Daishōten, hasn't it.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: That's all thanks to your amazing work, McQueen-chan.
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut

data.text:
If you manage to win the upcoming Fall Tenno 
Sho you'll be the second Uma Musume ever to 
win both the Spring and Fall Tenno Sho!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

data.text: The number of members is just going to increase after that!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl

data.text: Jeez… That is as long as I win.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
They can't help but be excited right now. After all, you have so 
much momentum/you're on a roll.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
They can't help but be excited right now. After all, you have so 
much momentum/you're on a roll.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
We're starting to get as much attention 
as Sensei did when he ran the team.
data.name: <username>

data.text: We're going to become a powerhouse team once again!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

data.text: I'll be cheering you on from the front row!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl

data.text: I get it, everyone. I will be sure to win the next race as well.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Now then, let's begin our training for today.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
“I will be sure to win” is what she said, and that determination 
was clearly evident in today's mock race.
Woaah! She's so fast!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: Goal! What an amazing victory. Even your finish was perfect!
data.name: <username>

data.text: Goal! What an amazing victory. Even your finish was perfect!
data.name: <username>

data.text: Haa… Haa… Whoo…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
During the Takarazuka Kinen I was unable to get 
into a good position so I had to take the corners 
at a wide angle. It was quite difficult.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
I need to stay conscious of when to dash and proper positioning 
so that I can comfortably finish these races.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Ho ho ho… It seems as though you are nearly prepared to face me.
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
Before you and I can race one another 
you need to pass your gate test.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Well that's it for today. Everyone, make 
sure to apply ice to your legs.
data.name: <username>

data.text: Umm, Trainer-san.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
I am still full of energy, so I would 
like to go for one more lap.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Ah, if that's the case I want to do one more lap too!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl

data.text:
Me too! If McQueen-chan is giving her 
all I've got to do so as well!
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut

data.text: Eh? You don't have to force yourself to do what I am…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
It's fine, don't worry about us! After all, 
we love watching the way you run.
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

choices.text: Everyone, just make sure to pace yourselves.
choices.processed: <size=36>Everyone, just make sure to pace yourselves.</size>

data.text: Jeez… Well, we will be back.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Woaah! She's all fired up! Welp, guess I've gotta get in her way.
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: Hey!! Stop trying to grab my tail!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Mejiro McQueen's success has had a positive 
impact on the rest of the team members.
She is, without a doubt, the heart of this team.
Trainer-san!
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

data.text: Tazuna-san, what's the matter?
data.name: <username>

data.text: I have something to discuss with you regarding McQueen-san…
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
